attributes.action: Finding a solution to stop knife offenses.
attributes.background: In recent months, there have been many crimes involving knives. It is a general problem involving young people under the age of 18 who walk on night streets stalking people. We have to find a solution to stop all these crimes, it is very worrying what is happening.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. Alternatively, you could sign one of the petitions relating to knife crime which is already open on our website.
